Quote: “Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.”
Movie: Episode IV | A New Hope

Quote: “I find your lack of faith disturbing.”
Movie: Episode IV | A New Hope

Quote: “It’s the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs. I’ve outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I’m talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She’s fast enough for you, old man.”
Movie: Episode IV | A New Hope

Quote: “The Force will be with you. Always.”
Movie: Episode IV | A New Hope

Quote: “Why, you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder!”
Movie: Episode V | The Empire Strikes Back

Quote: “Never tell me the odds!”
Movie: Episode V | The Empire Strikes Back

Quote: “Do. Or do not. There is no try.”
Movie: Episode V | The Empire Strikes Back

Quote: “No. I am your father.”
Movie: Episode V | The Empire Strikes Back

Quote: “When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.”
Movie: Episode VI | The Return of the Jedi

Quote: “I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.”
Movie: Episode VI | The Return of the Jedi

Quote: “Now, young Skywalker, you will die.”
Movie: Episode VI | The Return of the Jedi

Quote: “Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.”
Movie: Episode VI | The Return of the Jedi

Quote: “There’s always a bigger fish.”
Movie: Episode I | The Phantom Menace

Quote: “In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view.”
Movie: Episode I | The Phantom Menace

Quote: “You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting.”
Movie: Episode I | The Phantom Menace

Quote: “Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.”
Movie: Episode I | The Phantom Menace

Quote: “Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there?”
Movie: Episode II | Attack of the Clones

Quote: “We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it.”
Movie: Episode II | Attack of the Clones

Quote: “I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.”
Movie: Episode II | Attack of the Clones

Quote: “What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?”
Movie: Episode II | Attack of the Clones

Quote: “The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.”
Movie: Episode III | Revenge of the Sith

Quote: “Power! Unlimited power!”
Movie: Episode III | Revenge of the Sith

Quote: “So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause.”
Movie: Episode III | Revenge of the Sith

Quote: “You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you.”
Movie: Episode III | Revenge of the Sith

Quote: “To die for one’s people is a great sacrifice. To live for one’s people, an even greater sacrifice. I choose to live for my people.”
Movie: Star Wars The Clone Wars

Quote: “You are the Chosen One. You have brought balance to this world. Stay on this path, and you will do it again for the galaxy. But beware your heart.”
Movie: Star Wars The Clone Wars

Quote: “Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will.”
Movie: Star Wars The Clone Wars

Quote: “The Sith killed each other, victims of their own greed. But from the ashes of their destruction, I was the last survivor. I chose to pass my knowledge on to only one. I created a legacy so resilient that now you come before me.”
Movie: Star Wars The Clone Wars

Quote: “The Sith took everything from me. Ripped me from my mother’s arms, murdered my brother, used me as a weapon, and then cast me aside. Abandoned me. Once, I had power — now I have nothing.”
Movie: Star Wars Rebels

Quote: “I am no Jedi.”
Movie: Star Wars Rebels

Quote: “An object cannot make you good or evil. The temptation of power, forbidden knowledge, even the desire to do good can lead some down that path. But only you can change yourself.”
Movie: Star Wars Rebels

Quote: “If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.”
Movie: Star Wars Rebels

Quote: “The garbage’ll do!”
Movie: Episode VII | The Force Awakens

Quote: “Chewie, we’re home.”
Movie: Episode VII | The Force Awakens

Quote: “You know, no matter how much we fought, I’ve always hated watching you leave.”
Movie: Episode VII | The Force Awakens

Quote: “Oh, my dear friend. How I’ve missed you.”
Movie: Episode VII | The Force Awakens

Quote: “I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me.”
Movie: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

Quote: “Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost.”
Movie: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

Quote: “Jyn, I’ll be there for you. Cassian said I had to.”
Movie: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

Quote: “Hope.”
Movie: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
